name: Football Mogul 15
description: Football Mogul 15 is the 12th version of the addictive football simulation game from the makers of Baseball Mogul.This version includes rosters and player ratings for opening weekend of the 2015-2016 season. Enjoy controlling your football franchise in any year from 1970 to 2015.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / Windows 7 / Windows Vista / Windows XP Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 175 MB available space
